name: Advan
desc: Mobile phone traffic data and weather data dating back to 1998. 1,600 tickers covered across several sectors. US and EU focused.
sectors: Agriculture, Airlines, Autos, Consumer, Energy, Financial Services, Gaming, Healthcare, Industrials, Insurance, Media, Real Estate, Restaurants & Food Delivery, Retail, Telecom, Travel
data_delivery: Raw, Platform Based, Research Reports, Custom Analysis
use_cases: Geo-location data and weather conditions that affect the performance of a retailer.
